title: Natural Hair KINKY TO STRAIGHT ROUTINE (full body/one product!)
description: This video shows a natural hair routine for straightening kinky hair using only one product. The creator details each step, from washing and conditioning to blow drying and straightening, while emphasizing the importance of detangling and using a brush chase method. title: DIY silk press on type 4 hair | detailed tutorial with tips, tools + techniques

title: DETAILED Parting Tutorial | How To Get The Perfect Parts!

title: Beginner Friendly: How To Achieve Braided Ponytail with Traction Alopecia
description: This video demonstrates a braided ponytail style for people with minimal or no edges, a common concern for those with traction alopecia. The creator shares their technique for achieving a sleek, flat ponytail using edge control, hair gel, and wrapping strips, followed by a detailed tutorial on braiding with extensions.

title: Crochet on Alopecia hair
description: The stylist demonstrates how to do crochet braids on hair affected by alopecia, focusing on techniques that minimize tension(i.e. use of a net to achieve the look) and promote a natural look. The video includes tips for selecting the right hair type and ensuring a secure installation without causing further damage to the scalp.

title: How To Cover Your Bald Thin Edges! (Traction Alopecia)
description: This is a super sensitive video for me, revealing my thin balding edges. I'm going to show you what I use in this video to cover my bald spots and put my hair in a high bun! There is hope for people that suffer from Traction Alopecia such as myself, by finding the right products that will suit you. I hope this helps someone out there!

title: BEST TIP for the TENDER HEADED (achieving buns and ponytails)
